description.en:
QnodeCoin (QNC) is a digital, p2p payment currency alternatively for real life (vendors) use. QNC is built for vendors use and mining only, while we explore for other utility. QnodeCoin has two-tier network with built in incentivized nodes that are decentralized with masternode governance. 
Its fast, easy, secure, with near-zero fees, Instant send payments features (SwiftX), and Privacy Send (with Zerocoin Protocol)
